name: Otto's Lost Record
description:
Description

Otto's Lost Record is our first game jam project, we intended on doing a mix between Stardew Valley Mining and Binding of Isaac.

In the game you control a dog and a cat facing various caves. The objective is to beat 5 cave levels to find the lost record.

Controls

"E" to interact (with the NPCs, doors, holes or even the little well!);

"Space" to change characters;

"Left click" to attack;

"Right click" or "F" to mine;

"WASD" or Arrows to walk.

Some comments

We could not polish as much as we wanted. It is indeed really hard not to overscope in a game jam, but it was fun to do it anyway.

We are super excited with what we have learned. Thank you so much if you tried the game, it really means a lot!
